artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing Task 872 coordination, TeammateTool model parameter API, and configuration schema for per-language model defaults

summary: Task 872 has Phases 1-3 complete with language routing infrastructure in place. Claude Code supports model specification via natural language in teammate prompts (model: sonnet/opus/haiku/inherit). Recommended approach: extend team-wave-helpers.md language_config with default_model field per language, defaulting Lean to opus for complex theorem proving.
